infoHouse: Slytherin was founded by Salazar Slytherin, a cunning and ambitious wizard who valued cleverness, ambition, determination, and blood purity.
infoHouseBottom: Historically, the house has been home to powerful and often controversial wizards, including figures such as Severus Snape and Tom Riddle (Voldemort).

characterOne.name: Draco Malfoy
characterOne.info: A cunning and ambitious wizard from Slytherin House, Draco is known for his sharp wit, pride in his pure-blood heritage, and rivalry with Harry Potter.

characterTwo.name: Severus Snape
characterTwo.info: A brave and complex Slytherin who mastered Potions and Defense Against the Dark Arts. His loyalty and sacrifice reveal true courage beneath his stern exterior.

characterThree.name: Tom Riddle (Voldemort)
characterThree.info: Once a brilliant student, Tom Riddle became Lord Voldemort — the darkest wizard of all time, whose ambition and thirst for power knew no bounds.
